column5: Yup.. Id need new underwear, but what a beautiful animal...    not much fishing to be done so I thoght I d share:
I thought you were going to say the mrs,s in on the loose. Im on the hunt. LOL Wonder how many people had their eyes locked on him like I did. That was cool.
No, just no, I didn't even like the house cats following me!
Naw, someone let out the Pink Panther
This will one rough you up!
wow you can see how big it really is in that scene when its on the log looking the other way
That would make any pit bull wimper.
This is an Ontario Cougar, Mantbass2 may have another opinion! This is a killer species.found in backwoods bars!
